name: Altria Group, Inc.
description: Altria Group, Inc. is one of the largest producers and marketers of tobacco, cigarettes, and related products in the United States. Founded in 1987 and headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, Altria has a rich heritage of more than 150 years in the tobacco industry. The company is best known for its flagship cigarette brand, Marlboro, which has been a market leader for decades. Altria has diversified its product offerings over the years, expanding into smokeless tobacco products, such as Copenhagen and Skoal, as well as wine and innovative smoke-free alternatives like e-cigarettes and vaping products under the JUUL brand. With a commitment to harm reduction, Altria is investing in science-based research to develop less harmful products, reflecting the changing preferences of consumers and the regulatory landscape. The company’s mission is to responsibly transition adult smokers to a smoke-free future while also maintaining its commitment to social responsibility and sustainability. Altria actively engages in corporate social responsibility initiatives, focusing on youth tobacco prevention and supporting communities across the nation.
